name: Shiskaquine
description: Shiskaquine is semi-sedative, CBD heavy strain with heirloom indica genetics out of the Emerald Triangle. With a 20:1 CBD-to-THC ratio, this flower is dense with resin and smells of sweet berries and skunk. The psychoactivity of this strain is limited to a mild sedation that crawls across the body in tandem with the soothing effects brought on the by the immense quantity of CBD. This strain works hardest for patients suffering from anxiety, moderate physical discomfort, and nausea. This Harlequin and Shiskaberry cross was created by Matrix NV.
descriptionPlain: Shiskaquine is semi-sedative, CBD heavy strain with heirloom indica genetics out of the Emerald Triangle. With a 20:1 CBD-to-THC ratio, this flower is dense with resin and smells of sweet berries and skunk. The psychoactivity of this strain is limited to a mild sedation that crawls across the body in tandem with the soothing effects brought on the by the immense quantity of CBD. This strain works hardest for patients suffering from anxiety, moderate physical discomfort, and nausea. This Harlequin and Shiskaberry cross was created by Matrix NV.

highlightedReviews.text: This beautiful CBD srain, is a an amazing flower. It helps my mind relax. i don't feel tense i feel free when I exhale . Definitely my mug of coffee ðŸ–’

Amazing, is the word I would use.  The CBD/THC balance with the terpene profile unique to this plant, makes for an amazing, comfortable high.  Blows anxiety out of the ballpark.  Kudos to Matrix NV for an excellent concentrate; the berry aftertaste is the most epic thing I've experienced from cannabis outside of its obvious effects xD
